org.jclouds.vcloud.director.v1_5.user

Interface VCloudDirectorAsyncClient

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    VCloudDirectorAdminAsyncClient

    public interface VCloudDirectorAsyncClient
    Provides asynchronous access to VCloudDirector via their REST API.
    Author:
    Adrian Cole
    See Also:
    VCloudDirectorClient
